newsitem.title: BULGARIA: BULGARIAN BANKING STATISTICS - UPDATED AUG 23.
newsitem.headline: BULGARIAN BANKING STATISTICS - UPDATED AUG 23.

text.p: (Updates by changes in M1, M2, broad money and c-bank
refinancing in the week to August 16)
Central exchange rate-Bulgarian National Bank (BNB) daily fix:
Broad money in billion levs:
M1 pct change +0.78 (Aug16-Aug 9)
M2 pct change +1.65 (Aug16-Aug 9)
Central bank total refinancing in billion levs:
Central interest rate (CIR):108 pct annual (67 pct until May9)
BNB annual repo rate: 70 pct (1-2 days); 72 pct(3-4 days)
Interbank annual repo rate (up to 14 days) - 110-112 pct
Money market lev funds rate- 115 pct
Average bank offered lev rate on term deposits of companies
and individuals, annual pct - 90-95
Bank lending rates, annual pct - 112-118
Coupon T-bills cumulative annual yield - 165-187 pct
Coupon T-notes cumulative annual yield - 108-109 pct
Discount T-bills cumulative annual yield - 175 pct
-- Sofia Newsroom, 359-2-876032
